overview: We all know it's something of a taboo in some quarters, but if anything that only makes the thought of interracial sex all the more appealing for some folks. Including Nikki Stills and her friends Jennifer, Aubrey and Laryn - all of whom have a real hard taste for black dick, and who will clearly stop at nothing to get a taste of those handsome dark mambas for themselves.
title: Getting Dark in the Ass
